long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy SERP Preview

Improve your productivity with instant search result previews!

I'm an SEO professional myself, so I create tools I'd use myself. That's why it's free! I hope it improves your workflow.

What does it do?
The extension pulls information from the page itself and creates the preview. 

- Instant Preview: See how your page appears in search results with just one click.
- Desktop & Mobile Views: Toggle between desktop and mobile previews to ensure your site looks great on all devices.
- Character Counters: Keep your titles and descriptions optimized with handy character counters.
- Dark Mode: Easy on the eyes with a built-in dark mode option.

Who is it for?
- SEO professionals auditing and improving client websites.
- Digital marketers optimizing campaign landing pages.
- Content creators fine-tuning their articles for maximum impact.

How to use it?
1. Install the extension and click its icon while on any webpage.
2. Instantly see how that page appears in search results.
3. Use the toggles to switch between desktop/mobile views and light/dark modes.
4. Use the character counters to ensure your meta tags are the perfect length.
